function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive coefficients for most cities across the country and statistically significant at the 0.01 level, except for the northwestern cities.","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of contagious diseases in cities with positive coefficients.","Mitigation":"Implement stricter containment measures in cities with positive coefficients, especially in areas surrounding Hubei Province.","Technologies":"Data analysis and predictive modeling to identify high-risk areas.","People":"Residents and visitors in cities with positive coefficients.","Owner":"Local health authorities and government agencies."},{"Description":"Negative coefficients observed in only a handful of sub-provincial cities and prefecture-level cities, but not statistically significant.","Impact":"Potential for misinterpretation of data leading to inadequate measures in cities with negative coefficients.","Mitigation":"Conduct further analysis to determine the impact of negative coefficients on disease spread.","Technologies":"Data analysis and statistical modeling to assess the significance of negative coefficients.","People":"Residents and visitors in cities with negative coefficients.","Owner":"Data analysts and public health researchers."},{"Description":"Higher coefficients in county-level cities with 36.36% showing the highest coefficient range.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread in county-level cities with higher coefficients.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions and surveillance in county-level cities with the highest coefficient range.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis and surveillance technology to monitor disease spread.","People":"Residents and visitors in county-level cities with higher coefficients.","Owner":"Local health authorities and government agencies."}]}
